comments: Had him just for my lab class,I adored him! He is great. His lectures for lab were always VERY clear. I was unsure about having two different bio teachers(one for lab and one for lecture) but this turned out to be no problem! He doesnt give away the answers ever, but makes it so YOU can answer the question by yourself.

His Lab class is pretty easy, just dont flake out and you are pretty much guaranteed a B at the least. Take notes on his lab lecture and review the chapters in the packet before tests and you\'ll do fine.
if you are taking other classes and need a good grade, dont take. You may kill yourself for a B, didnt care for him, he is not that great

I took him for Bio94L and he is a great professor who explains things clearly. He tells you what you should take a look at for the tests. 4 Lab Practicals and One Final. You do have to study a lot though. Anyways, he\'s cool. Just try hard and you\'ll be fine.
Only took his lab class not lecture. He is always available to help as long as you ask. I\'m getting an A in the class. Just attend and take notes from his slides and you\'ll be good.

You guys are all pansies, Pierre is the bomb diggity. You have to pay attention because he calls on people randomly during his pre-lab lecture. And he takes points off your lab if your late...lame. But Ya he is really nice. Lab exams are kinda hard, but study and you will be fine!

Lecture is not mandatory but you should go because otherwise you will do horrible on his tests. Four Hard exams, 6 pop quizzes, and one 4-5 page paper. Lab is mandatory, but it is usually fun and goes by fast. He will help you with lab questions if you ask, pretty easy going guy.

Im not getting an A in his class, infact at the moment im getting a C. He does expect you to do your own work as in studying, which you have to do for any biology class. There is no homework except for a paper (dont worry its not that bad). If you ask for help he tries to hint at the anwser rather than just give it to you, so you understand it mor

He\'s a generally good teacher. STUDY FOR THE TESTS! and you have to show up for lab, he takes roll. He doesn\'t care if you show up for lecture but it\'s in your best interest to do so because it helps to listen to his lecture rather then just copy notes.

he\'s fiesty. he\'s not willing to help if you\'re struggling in class. he expects you to be on his level about biology. i got B\'s in my other bio classes, but ever since i took this class ive been struggling & when i ask him for help, he makes me feel stupid. he only favors those who are getting 90% and above in his class. i wouldn\'t recommend him

he\'s a nice guy, just not as a teacher. he tells you to not be afraid to ask him if you have questions in lab, but when you ask him, he SNAPS at you! he makes you feel stupid by telling you to simply read the directions instead of helping you. if you\'re not doing so well in the class, instead of helping you when you ask him to, he just makes you f
